(b) A nuclear-related environmental incident in France causes the evacuation of at least 1,000 people, confirmed by the French Nuclear Safety Authority (ASN) and reported in their official records.

Then, will the global space economy exceed $500 billion in annual revenue by 2027? This will be resolved as 'Yes' if the global space economy's annual revenue, as reported by a recognized industry analyst such as the Space Foundation or Euroconsult, exceeds $500 billion for the year 2027. The revenue must be based on the official annual reports published by these organizations.

The comparison will be based on the most recent data available from the World Bank at the time of resolution. (b) OpenAI's annual revenue exceeds $5 billion for any calendar year between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The revenue figures must be reported by a reputable market research firm or OpenAI's official financial statements. (c) A French film wins the Palme d'Or at the Cannes Film Festival at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The win must be officially recognized by the Cannes Film Festival and recorded in their official records.

Q.title: Will Norway's annual GDP exceed 650 billion USD for at least one calendar year by January 1, 2028?
Q.body: This question will resolve as 'Yes' if Norway's annual Gross Domestic Product (GDP), as reported by the World Bank in its official statistics, exceeds 650 billion USD for any full calendar year between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028.
